price.review: It has been very difficult for me to take my grandson to school because of the difficulty in unlocking the car seat closure.  For people with weaker hands or arthritis, this tool makes is very easy to unclip the closure.  I highly recommend it.

This is a great, easy to use product, but in my opinion it is quite pricey for a piece of plastic. Ultimately I felt it was worth it enough to buy to help my children learn to unbuckle themselves but I definitely would have bought two if they werent so pricey.

It has helped but isn't life changing. We have a new Graco high back booster and the buckle is just really tough. My 5 year old child unbuckled herself in a Diono HBB but hasn't been able to in the Graco (and she's in the third row so hard for me to get to her to assist), so I decided to try the UnbuckleMe. She can easily insert it around the buckle but still has a hard time applying the necessary pressure to release the straps. Sometimes she can get them both, sometimes she can only get one, and sometimes I have to still get back there to help.
great product for grandma to use with her arthritis

My small 6 year old is finally able to unbuckle herself!  Shes never had the thumb strength to get that bottom buckle, so I finally decided to see if this was worth the cost to give her some more independence.  It works just as described and shes now able to get unbuckled instead of waiting for someone to come get her bottom buckle unlatched for her.

It's a little expensive for what it is but it has been so useful for my family. I have arthritis so it's hard to unbuckle my son when getting out of the car. I keep this in the front with me and when I park, I hand it to him and he unbuckle himself and then places it back in the center console. Would recommend, for sure!

I'm not sure I would trust it with a younger kid just because I would be worried that they would unbuckle themselves while the car was moving but for my four-year-old it really works well. He could use it from the second we unpackaged it and we have had no problems with it breaking or bending or anything.

quality.review: Wow!  This works great.  Barely need to press to open the buckle.  No thumb pain even with arthritis.  Love it!

Ever since my baby was born just under a year ago, I've noticed that my thumb has been hurting when unbuckling her from her carseat. I started researching online to see if there were any products out there that would make it easier to depress the center red button and I came across this product. Let me tell you, I am so in love with this as a mom but also as a hand therapist. I see many arthritis patients who suffer from debilitating arthritis at the base of the thumb. Unfortunately, by the time I see them in therapy, it is already so far gone and painful that they can only resort to surgery to help alleviate the pain. I know that since I am relatively young, this product will help save my hand. I think all parents need to know about this product. Your thumb might not hurt now while you're young, but it certainly may later on if you don't protect your joints. This product uses the power of leverage to greatly reduce the amount of force required from your hand to unbuckle your child from the carseat. I considered other similar, yet different products on amazon and there were 3 problems: 1) they attach to the carseat which invalidates the manufacturer's warranty 2) if they attach to the carseat, your child may unbuckle themselves mid-ride 3) the product may not use enough leverage to actually reduce the force you need to unbuckle. I will continue to buy the UnbuckleMe for friends and family!!
Small and handy

I purchased this for my 4 year old to use.  Previously, we had purchased a Buckle Bopper, but he still couldnt use it on his own.  The UnbuckleMe makes unbuckling nearly effortless.  My son figured it out after brief instruction, and can even use it to unbuckle his younger sister.  This makes for happy kids who feel more independent, and a happy mom who doesnt have to climb back to the 3rd row quite as often. Im a CPST and will recommend this product to others, not just because it works so well, but because it doesnt attach or interfere with the seat in any way.

carseat.review: As a grandfather with arthritis in my thumbs, I am delighted to be able to open my great grandson's car seat with little effort and almost no pain! It was nearly impossible before I got my UnbuckleMe!

My boys can both use this easily, and they cant unbuckle themselves without it! I just pass it back to them when we get to our destination. The three-year-old uses it to unbuckle himself, then he passes it to his big brother to use. It has a keychain loop to keep on your keys, but its a bit bulky for that so we just keep it in the car console when not in use.

I got this for my mom after my kid got stuck in the car because her arthritic thumbs couldn't depress the buckle button enough.  This has blown her mind.  So simple and so effective.  My 5 yo was able to get out of his seat on his own using this (the button is really stiff) and my younger kid was so much happier not having to wiggle out of a partially released car seat belt. As an Occupational Therapist myself, I can vouch for this for anyone with limited strength in their hands.  My only complaint about this is that I didn't come up with it myself.
Got my 22 month granddaughter out of her car seat in a flash! And no broken nails!!

I work with parents and caregivers to teach them how to install and use their carseats properly.  Sometimes they mention how hard it is to undo a harness buckle, and I reach into my supply kit and show them this awesome gadget.  After a couple of practice tries, they love how easy it is to use to get that buckle undone. I really like how its shaped to hook right onto a seatback pocket for storage, or has the small loop to attach to a keychain.  I also like that it doesnt attach to the carseats crotch strap, since all seat manuals prohibit adding unapproved products to seats.
this product truly helped my Mother in Law. She has arthritis and diminished hand strength. with this she is able to open my son's carseat with no trouble.
My hands have arthritis so its hard to get my grand daughter out of the car seat. This helped a great deal. Thank you.
Using this tool it was easier getting my Granddaughter out of the car seat. My fingers are just not strong enough now that I am older.
disabled daughter is able to get her little one in and out of car seat

carseats.review: I initially purchased a similar product to help my mother-in-law be able to unbuckle my son from his carseat in the event she would be caring for him (her hands are too weak from arthritis). The product worked okay for that, but then once my son was old enough, I allowed him to start using that product to get himself out of his carseat, as we were expecting our third child and he would be going into the back of our minivan and I didn't want to have to climb in and out each time to help him unless necessary. He eventually figured it out, but it was fairly difficult and not super reliable. I was still having to get into the backseat multiple times per week to help him out. I heard about the UnbuckleMe on a carseat safety group I belong to. And I loved the design of it. What the previous product lacked was something to go under the buckle to push against, plus it was bulky. The UnbuckleMe seemed great. Light, easy design and it does not require much force to get the buckle open. There's even a little hole to allow a keychain loop to be added. My daughter had been wanting the other product for herself, as she's highly independent, so I purchased the UnbuckleMe for her instead to try out. She's pleased as punch! She's not quite able to use the UnbuckleMe by herself (she's 3), but I'm okay with that, since she's so young. My 5 yo can use it without any difficulties. Since we've only used it for about a week or so, I'm not sure how durable it is, especially when children are the primary users of it in my home anyway. But it is a good investment and does exactly what it claims.

Works.  Takes getting used to slipping the back part behind the buckle with a wiggling child helping, but I'm getting used to it and it requires much less force to open the car seat now.  My thumbs were cracking from pressing the button on the car seat so this seems to solve that problem.  Would recommend.

I bought this as a gift for my mother, who has rheumatoid arthritis. Over the last year Ive noticed shes had extreme difficulty unbuckling the grandkids from the car seats. She was so excited to try this after getting it for Christmas. Nearly a month has gone by and she reports she loves the UnbuckleMe. It makes a task she used dread into something ordinary and easy again. Thank you!

I absolutely love unbuckle me. I am an absentee grandma who has worried and worried about the difficulty I have with unbuckling my 4 and a half year-olds car seat. Now that I also have a 4 and a half month old, I was basically panicked. There is absolutely nothing I dont like about this wonderful gadget

This gadget is really helpful for grandparents who have a touch of arthritis in the thumbs. This has helped me push the red button to release the car seat harness. Everyone will have a different situation with car seat, so we found a place to store it where we can reach it easily, but the child can not. My husband came home yesterday raving about how much easier it was to get him out of the car seat. I got one for each car he rides in, and his mom is happy to have it if her hands are sore. Such a great product!

Wow! UnbuckleMe is so easy to use and works great. I love it and have already recommended it to family and friends! Perfect for grandparents taking care of the grandkids. This is also great for people with joint pain and/or muscle weakness in the hands and arms. Great product!

OUTSTANDING! I am a young grandmother in my 50s and TIRED of breaking my nails on the car seat fasteners. Both my granddaughter and I LOVE this gadget. She keeps it tucked inside the pocket of her carseat. I never have to look for it. When we make it to our destination, I ask her to get it ready. In SECONDS the carseat is unbuckled. What a godsend! Truly, if we had been in an accident or other emergency, it would have taken me several attempts to free my granddaughter. I consider this a danger! This little device makes carseats enjoyable again. The color makes it easy to find and it fits logically right where it's supposed to.. . . . . no need to carry instructions.I cannot say enough about this product and would recommend it to everyone.

I have been using the UnbuckleMe for several months, and it is much better than advertised or than I expected it would be. This product, developed by an occupational therapist, makes the difficult and sometimes painful task of releasing the buckle on an infant's car seat, particularly for those who are older and may have lost some strength in their hand or fingers, substantially easier. It makes going for a ride with the kids, safe in the security of their car seats, something you want to do more often.

I was in a car accident in November and my right arm got hit by the airbag pretty badly, partially tearing the tendon in my right elbow. It's really difficult to have two kids (ages 3 and 1) in convertible car seats and not be able to do/undo their carseat buckles. One kid is facing forward, the other is rear facing, so I have some reaching to do on each. The UnbuckleMe was recommended to me by my physical therapist. I love the idea. My only real gripe is that if the children are in convertible car seats with NHTSA (National Highway and Traffic Safety Administration) approved 5-point harnesses, it is really difficult to get the UnbuckleMe into place to click the button. It's not long enough to go over top, which would be the easiest way to do it. To use it as is, I loosen the harness as much as possible, pull it out and then sort of shove the UnbuckleMe behind the buckle in front of my kids legs, trying to avoid pinching their chubby little thighs. It's actually harder for me to move the UnbuckleMe around than to just unbuckle the car seat. It needs two more inches at the closed end. Then you'd be able to go over top of the buckle, and it would be REALLY useful.
Grandma can finally unbuckle the car seat easily!  This is a great product for anyone with arthritic hands.

I never had a kid who tried to escape the car seat while driving, thankfully, but instead we have the opposite problem.  The buckle on our Britax seat is hard to push even for an adult and I don't think my kid will have the hand strength until he's outgrown the seat.  It bothers me that he can't get himself out in an emergency (even a lesser emergency like Mommy locked her keys and cell phone in the car which happened once.) We're keeping it in the cup holder so it's in reach.  I presented it as a safety issue and have been making him practice since there's a learning curve for little hands... it's been about a week and today he was excited to get out of the car seat completely by himself.

This product has been a lifesaver for my thumbs!  It makes unbuckling my grandbaby's car seat so easy.  Before the Unbuckle Me carseat tool, my thumb would hurt from trying to press down the button on the car seat as I have arthritis in my thumbs and the baby would cry while waiting to get out of the carseat.  With this tool, the baby is unbuckled in a flash and my thumb does not hurt.  I simply clip it to the side of the carseat, out of baby's reach, when not in use.  This is a must have product, especially for grandparents!
Said it was easy to use but it was NOT! I wasted money buying this. I wanted something quick AND EASY to use to get my child out of car seat.

harness.review: Works for our 4-5 year old getting out of his 5-point harness seat (Britax).  Needed this as our oldest was bumped into the 3rd row, cause he is the 3rd kid we would have to get in/out, so needed a solution to get him self out to help us out with the smaller ones.  With about 2 weeks of persistent/patient practice, he is now able to get out on his own.  Gave 4 stars, as I wish it was a solution that stayed on the buckle, but can see the safety implications...but would be great if it did stay in place over the release buckle. First review I have ever done, but figured there were other parents that needed to know.

Took a few tries to find the right product but I FINALLY found something that allows my independent 4yo to unbuckle herself and keep her safely in a 5pt harness longer. I see why people transition out of 5pt sooner, you've got other little ones to buckle  and having your 4+yo be able to get in and out on their own is very convenient. However, I also know keeping her in a 5pt as long possible is the safest thing to do. Im happy this solved our issue!

It is unbelievable how this little tool has changed everything!! I struggled so badly to unbuckle my great-grandsons harness on his car seat! It has actually taken up to 5 minutes to get it open!! I have crawled into the other side of the car to get better leverage. My poor little guy would get so frustrated, he knows it is time to get out but he is still stuck in his seat! In these hot miserable summer days, we both were roasting and I would be drenched in sweat by the time I was able to free him!! This little tool is just incredible! Place it over the button pinch the end and it pops right open!!! I can't thank the inventor of this tool enough!! I had gotten to the point I would make excuses not to have to take him someplace because I dreaded the whole buckle issue!! Now we can go places anytime with no worries at all!! THANKS!!!

I bought this hoping it would help my 5yr old be able to unbuckle herself from the 5 point harness Incase of an emergency. Well she can get it in place and push down but the center bump is too small so it only pushes on part of the red harness release, because of this she is only able to get one strap off and not the other. This would be a very handy tool for an adult that struggles with the release button but its not so handy for a child.

I got this because we have a Chevy Suburban and kids that sit in the way back. We make tiny kids, so my 6.5 year old is still in a harnessed, forward facing seat. She's less than 40 lbs and very petite and has been using this for about a week and has trouble each time getting it pressed down hard enough to release the buckle. Her seat's buckle is pretty thick, I guess, so it's harder to get the thing clamped on without pushing really hard, which is hard for a teeny 1st grader to do. I've been able to do it myself without trouble, so I know it works and I like the idea of it, so I didn't want to take it down too much just because my kid's a wee tot. I'm hoping she will get it down soon and we'll have less waiting-for-her-to-get-out-of-the-car-then-eventually-climbing-in-and-doing-it-ourselves.

Super hard to use, I got it so my 4 year old could undo his harness when we got to school so the teacher can get him out in the car line. He can not press hard enough to get it to work. I couldnt hardly get it pressed hard enough, its easier to just use our hands on the car seat. My mom couldnt use it at all.

This was the solution to moving my son's car to the 3rd row in our GMC Acadia. His arms aren't long enough to stretch the seat belt over his booster - so we installed the 5 point harness for him again - and this makes it super easy to release the "big red button" as he calls it. Great to have!

latch.review: Unbuckle Me is terrific!  I was not able to unbuckle my grandson's car seat, & therefore he was not able to stay with me. After I bought this item, it was so easy to unbuckle the car seat.  I now can take him everywhere. It has changed our lives!
This is the best one i have found.  My thumbs just aren't strong enough to pop the button on the car seat and that's a real problem.  This made it very easy.
I have arthritis in my thumbs and this product has been a life saver. If not for this product I would not be able to get my grandchild out of the car seat!
I purchased my unbuckle me and I love best little thing ever

This is easy for my 4 year old to use - I bought it as a birthday gift for him. I store it near the driver seat and pass it back to him when we park. He's able to unbuckle himself before I get to his door and loves the independence!
This is awesome.  Easy to work.  Works well.  I have recommended it to my other friends who have kids.
Awesome product. My mom suffers from dry hands and gets cracked thumbs. Which hurts when unbuckling a car seat.

Not easy for me to use at all...I have fibromyalgia plus an injured left wrist which made it difficult. But the biggest thing was there wasnt enough room between granddaughter's body and buckle to insert Unbuckle Me. Very disappointed...
This allows me to get my grandson out of his car seat. I had a really hard time with the latch before I found this.

lifesaver.review: I found this product to be invaluable in getting my grandson out of his car seat. It took some trials to figure out how to actually use the device and I realized I was not lifting the handle wide enough to slide it under the car seat buckle. Once that was figured out it has been so quick and easy. Due to a hand injury I am  unable to give any force on the car seat buckle and this device has solved the problem.

I have really painful arthritis in my hands and could never unbuckle my grandson's car seat, so we never went anywhere, until now. With very little pressure I can unbuckle his seat belt. Awesome product!!!!
Not a fan . Where the buckle sits on my car seat it was virtually impossible to use it without pressing on my grandson .

I just ordered a second one for my husbands car. My soon-to-be 5-year old was able to get herself unbuckled the first time she tried. Shes been mentioning that older kids get themselves out of the car so this makes her feel like a big kid while I can continue to keep her safely harnessed. Simple design and works perfectly!

I have serious problems with my fingers and joints and I cant use my thumbs anymore to press or bend anything, except texting. This little gadget helps to save me from further pain in my joints and it save my long beautiful nails

Bought this because when I get long nails put on at the nail salon,  I either have to keep my thumbnail shorter than all the others or keep it long and basically almost break it off everytime I have to get my kids out of their carseats. This simple, yet amazing contraption solves that problem for me and is a lifesaver. It's super easy and fast to slip it over the buckle and press to unlock it. The pressure needed is minimal, even my 3 year old daughter can do it.
I have arthritis in my hands and my right hand is especially weak. This works perfectly for getting the baby out of the car seat.

It has been such a help. I hated not being able to take my grandson places and with the unbuckle me I am so happy to be able to have fun with him again. I have arthritis in my hands and this is a real blessing

I am so glad I found this because I have such trouble getting my child out of the car seat when I have my nails done.  I had always had gel manicures but I started doing acrylic again so it lasts longer and this absolutely was a life saver!! Would buy again for friends!!

This product has been a lifesaver. We recently had our third baby and getting into the third row of our vehicle to buckle and unbuckle my oldest was becoming a pain. Now he can unbuckle all by himself. Was super easy for him to figure out how to use too. He is almost 5 for an age reference.

Life changing!!!! Showed my 5 year old how to use it once. He was able to unbuckle on the first try then got his little sister unbuckled too!! This is going to give my kids (and me!!) so much freedom.

One of my daughters found Unbuckle Me on amazon. I am almost finished recovering from my second surgery for arthritis of the thumbs...caused by over use and improper use. My daughter was concerned about me babysitting grandkids in car seats for a week. After reading about the development of your product and that an OT was involved I ordered it (and showed my OT so she had one less reason to worry about my recovery until my next therapy). I found the Unbuckle Me amazing and so easy to use. It takes a few seconds to get in place and then with little effort the car seat unbuckles. I will be buying these for my girls to use to save their thumb joints. Its easy to just leave it in the side door pocket of the car.

I can finally get my granddaughter out of her car seat quickly!  That had been such a struggle fighting that red button, but this handy gadget requires little force and releases both clips evenly.  Every new mom and grandma should be given one of these.  I keep mine in a door cup holder so it's right there when I need it without my toddler using it by herself.

I wear my nails long and since having my daughter Ive had to keep my thumbnails short to prevent breaking them when I unbuckle her car seat belt. My assistant found this amazing invention and its been a life charge for my manicures!

This is a great product.  I liked it so much I have already purchased it for two of my friends who are also grandmothers who love to take their grandchildren on outings.  They too are concerned about undoing the car seat!
Live saver! I have Rheumatoid Arthritis. Life safer wish I had it sooner. My son is three
My 4 year old can now get out of her car seat on her own which really helps so I dont have to climb in the 3rd row to get her out! Now only if there was a tool to help her buckle! Haha

This little gadget is the greatest thing ever!  I used to struggle to get my granddaughter out of her car seat because my nails were too long to push the release effectively - I even cut them down and I would still pinch her trying to get the thing to unlock.  There is absolutely no struggle with this.  Love it!!!!

UnbuckleMe is a godsend! I've lost strength in my hands and thanks to this amazing gizmo I don't stress anymore about traveling with my grandkids. There have been times when I would pull the kids "UP" and out then slip them back into the car seat because I couldn't unbuckle it.  Thank you for this wonderful gift.

I love this product! I can take my grandchildren out with me and never worry about how I'm going to push that button to get them out of their carseat! Thank you Unbuckle Me! This is the best thing ever!
I love this, it makes life so much easier and it saves my thumb.
This product is a life saver. Im able to take my sons out of their car seats without damaging my nails. Love it!!!! Super handy!
Works perfect! Sometimes my nails get too long makes unbuckling baby difficult with this its no problem!

The UnbuckleMe worked like a charm on our grandson's car seat.  Due to some arthritis in my thumbs, I had a terrible time pushing the button in to release his harness on the car seat.  This has been a lifesaver.  I highly recommend it.
I got this for my mother-in-law because she had a lot of trouble unbuckling mu daughters car seat due to weakness in her hands. She LOVES it! It works perfectly and its so easy for her to use.

Got this for my 6yo so he can unbuckle himself for school drop-off - his buckle was too difficult for his little hands to manage, this saved us and he can now be independent with getting in and out of his seat!

This is the most marvelous little tool I have ever purchased. So easy to use and the car seat belt unbuckles with ease.  I wouldn't be able to unbuckle the car seat seatbelt without it. Thank you for a inexpensive invention to get children out of car seat seatbelts.
So glad I purchased this...much easier to get my grandson out of his car seat.  Well worth it
A great help.  Great invention !

I'm a new mom and had no idea how difficult it would be to unbuckle the clip on a carseat.  Especially when leaving the seat in my car, I'm at at awkward angle in a tight space and usually trying to not wake up the baby.  I did some googling and came across this product--holy lifesaver!  It makes unbuckling so much easier.  My only complaint is that the plastic is coated in a rubbery coating so sometimes it's hard to slide onto the buckle, but it is such a small complaint I would still encourage everyone to get one of these. My thumb feels so much better!

After having 2 thumb surgeries and a broken shoulder,  Im happy to find something that works opening  car seats ! Now I can take my twin grandchildren to preschool without having to find someone to help me!

I have Rheumatoid Arthritis that comes and goes.  When it's flared, I can't get me grandson out of his car seat without some help.  This device has made all the difference.  Once it's in the correct position, it requires minimal pressure to release the buckle.  Wish I would've had this sooner!  :-)

My 4 year old feels so independent using this to unbuckle herself! A must for any parent!!!

Its a nail saver. I love my nails bug couldn't get them in fear of breaking the thumbs everytime I took my son out his car seat. But with this tool Im able to get my nails the length I want and get my son out with ease.
Best tool I have ever used I have arthritis in both thumbs and it got to the point where I could not undo my grandchild belt this if such an easy tool to unlock the belt love it!
I struggle with my granddaughters carseat buckle.  I've had surgery for arthritis on both thumbs.  This gadget works!  Makes it so much easier.

Its very poor material

I used this product to help me unbutton the red button on my grand daughters car seat. I have really bad arthritis and I couldn't put enough force to get it open. This was perfect and a lifesaver. I highly recommend this product.

I have wanted one of these for months and finally got around to ordering it 3 days ago. Let me tell you this thing is a THUMB saver and TIME saver, and SANITY saver! My 6yr olds car seat is so hard to unbuckle, it cracks skin on my thumb every time. The drop off line at school wa pointless because he sits in the 3rd row and cant unbuckle himself. I was recently diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis and unlatching the buckle on the carseat was nearly impossible. This wonderful unbuckle me is my new favorite gadget. No more pain when getting the grandkids out of the carseat. No more avoiding taking them with me because I was afraid I wouldn't be able to get them out without unbearable pain.
LOVE IT!! Arthritis made it difficult to unbuckle her carseat quickly, until UnbuckleMe.

The buckle for my son was starting to get sticky, plus he's in the middle, so it's not easy to get a good angle. I also feel much safer as I could actually unbuckle their seats in an emergency. I highly recommend this to anyone who has kids in car seats!

Why oh why did I not know about this product years ago. I have broken way too many nails trying to get my child out of the car seat. This is a total nail saver. I wish someone would have gifted me this for my baby shower.

This is amazing worth every penny. I can now easily open up the buckle for my daughters car seat with out it hurting my thumbs and without breaking my nails. 100% recommend

Very good

This has been a big help for my kiddo and me! Makes it much easier.

As my wife brings this product in from the doorstep, I thought to myself man we buy too much, the package is opened and I see a molded piece of plastic that can not cost more then a dime to make. Knowing that she has issues unbuckling my childs car seat, I leave it at that. With this cheap easy fix to her problem sitting on the counter I make a few passes finally picking the product up to fiddle with it. Looking closer I see that the unbuckler arrived in poor quality. Speaking to my wife I ask how much we paid for this, with the normal reply of, I dont remember, I decided to log on and see. $15. For this. Now I know it does fix an issue that may be present but that is a ridiculous price. For this price I expect the product to show up in pristine condition. The issues that this product arrived with were not from shipping. It left there site like this. If this is the quality control they allow, the price for this product should be $2-4. For $15 I expect more. Now Im off to work to earn more money to spend on overprice, poor quality products.

Now that I have received my Unbuckle me Car Seat Buckle Release tool, I of course found the one I misplaced. This product is a life saver for me. This product is amazing saves my nails and my fingers . This has changed my life as a 64 yr old grandmother. I love that it opens both at a time.

review_types.best_review: I initially purchased a similar product to help my mother-in-law be able to unbuckle my son from his carseat in the event she would be caring for him (her hands are too weak from arthritis). The product worked okay for that, but then once my son was old enough, I allowed him to start using that product to get himself out of his carseat, as we were expecting our third child and he would be going into the back of our minivan and I didn't want to have to climb in and out each time to help him unless necessary. He eventually figured it out, but it was fairly difficult and not super reliable. I was still having to get into the backseat multiple times per week to help him out. I heard about the UnbuckleMe on a carseat safety group I belong to. And I loved the design of it. What the previous product lacked was something to go under the buckle to push against, plus it was bulky. The UnbuckleMe seemed great. Light, easy design and it does not require much force to get the buckle open. There's even a little hole to allow a keychain loop to be added. My daughter had been wanting the other product for herself, as she's highly independent, so I purchased the UnbuckleMe for her instead to try out. She's pleased as punch! She's not quite able to use the UnbuckleMe by herself (she's 3), but I'm okay with that, since she's so young. My 5 yo can use it without any difficulties. Since we've only used it for about a week or so, I'm not sure how durable it is, especially when children are the primary users of it in my home anyway. But it is a good investment and does exactly what it claims.
review_types.worst_review: I purchased my unbuckle me and I love best little thing ever
